name: Lycan
passiveSkills: Reduce damage taken by all allies by 35%
Grant Spell Vamp, Echo, and Lifesteal to all allies for 3 turns at the start of battle
35% Chance to Increase Power by 1 and Fury Generation by 5% when any ally takes damage
Heal allies to full and grant Echo and All Damage Reflect Shield for the duration of battle when any ally dies.
